item.title: Welcome to Hugo (from Jekyll)
item.description: Welcome to my completely reworked website! This time, I’ve dropped the complexity of Wordpress and opted for something significantly simpler: Jekyll and GitHub. A few quick links that I found particularly helpful: How I’m using Jekyll in 2016 Secure & Fast Github pages with CloudFlare Utterances - Blog Commenting using GitHub Issues
